ShipView your ship and its equipment in the currently selected Hangar.P.E.T.View your P.E.T. and its equipment in the currently selected Hangar.DronesView your Drones and their equipment in the currently selected HangarSwitch to configuration 1Switch to configuration 2 Are you sure you want to downgrade? Add hangarPurchase an additional Hangar.A Hangar lets you store ships and quickly switch between them by activating or warping a different Hangar. Do you want to buy a Hangar for %hangar_price%?It seems that the price of this item has changed. Do you still want to buy a Hangar for %hangar_price%?A Hangar lets you store ships and quickly switch between them by activating or warping a different Hangar. Unfortunately, you do not have the full %hangar_price% required to buy one.BuyHangar successfully purchased. Allocate shipUse the allocate button to allocate this ship to the currently selected Hangar.Allocate a new ship to the currently selected Hangar. Warning! Any ship currently occupying that Hangar will be automatically sold!Allocate Clear ConfigurationDeletes current configuration.Warning! You are about to delete your shipÂ´s current configuration. Do you really wish to proceed ?Delete Rename HangarRename your Hangar as you please. (This feature is only available with an active Premium subscription.) Rename P.E.T.You can rename your P.E.T. for %pet_rename_price%. UpgradeUpgrade to level %level%!Chance of success:Total costs:UpgradeFAILUREUpgrade attempt failed.SUCCESSUpgraded to level %level%!Upgrade damage bonus to %amount%%.Upgrade shield bonus to %amount%%.Upgrade durability bonus to %amount%.Upgrade booster bonus to %amount%.Upgrade repair bonus to %amount%.Upgrade deflector shield bonus minutes to %amount%.Upgraded damage bonus to %amount%%.Upgraded shield bonus to %amount%%.Upgraded durability bonus to %amount%.Upgraded booster bonus to %amount%.Upgraded repair bonus to %amount%.Upgraded deflector shield bonus minutes to %amount%.
